# 6. Deprecated XML API

Date: 2024-03-15

## Status

Deprecated

Superseded by [5. API versioning strategy](0005-api-versioning-strategy.md)

## Context

The original XML-based API was designed for legacy integrations.

## Decision

We implemented an XML API for backwards compatibility.

## Consequences

This API is now deprecated in favor of the JSON API with proper versioning.
